solution_line_template: If all {num_stoplights} stoplights are red, the first route will take {base_time_first_route} + {num_stoplights}*{red_light_penalty} = <<{base_time_first_route}+{num_stoplights}*{red_light_penalty}={time_first_route_all_red}>>{time_first_route_all_red} minutes.

Thus, the first route will take {time_first_route_all_red}-{time_second_route} = <<{time_first_route_all_red}-{time_second_route}={time_difference}>>{time_difference} minutes longer than the second route.
